H0.text: Pole is what magnets have as a north and a south.

H1.text: Arch is what magnets have a “north” and a “south.”

H2.text: Grid is what magnets have a “north” and a “south.”

H3.text: Temperature is what magnets have a “north” and a “south.”

A4.text: One of the two ends of a magnet

A5.text: The North magnetic pole of planet Earth, a point where the north end of a compass points downward
